name: Samrat
about: I am a experianced cloud computing engineer with contribution in multiple personal and open source projects. I am a avid enthusiast of home labbing and self hosting, till data i have hosted multiple of my projects and web services on my personal servers with the use of various technologies like Docker, Docker-Compose, k8s, Terraform, nginx, htppd/apache and more. This obsession of me with servers and backend infrastructure has made me into a very efficient backend engineer. I am able to automate entire applications allowing for deployment with a few commands. Due to my self taught skills and the limited hardware avalable i have developed the skill to migrate deployments on the fly being able to switch from supabase to firebase as soon as a new offer is announced. Please find more about my capablities below.

details: Deploying and maintaining server infrastructures by using softwares like Terraform.
Implimenting automatic features like container build, run, stop and kill.
Ensuring optimized load balancing reducing stress nodes.
Configuring amazon linux for maxium performance
Undertaking serverless deployment with Vercel and Docker, ensuring easy quick deployment while avoiding vendor lock in
Reducing server costs by running highly stripped down and optimized containers.
Implimenting up-time optimizations to maintaining minimum operational capacity ensuring cost effective deployment.
Migrating database from firebase to supabase.
Implimenting maximum compatablity with PostgreSQL to ensure high speed data fetching
Implimenting high quality auth feature and data hash function.
